images.name: 2_N
images.desc: Also, we came to know that Analog and Digital communication paper was largely inspired from previous papers. This happened after finding similarity in first-sem. So, we prepared second-sem likewise and voila, got almost the same paper. We also tried to do in end-sem, but someone from our batch informed about it to the professor and hence the paper got changed.

As a consequence, Devansh had to travel with an aunty and was cursing his luck throughout the journey instead of doing the cool talk with Roshan

images.name: 20_H
images.desc: The smiles after first group project where we decided our own groups. Did the real work in one day. Project was of Analog Circuits under Rutu Parekh Ma’am, 9 guys and a girl. Also everyone decided to wear shirts because there was a word around that Rutu Ma’am gives extra credits for wearing shirt. Shashank thought to go candid as it was the trend then. Ashutosh hasn’t still grown up as you can see his attempt to create horns on Roshan

images.name: 21_H
images.desc: A literal snapshot of our analog circuit project. Most of weren’t even aware if the results are going to work or not and were sleeping on the floor. We were so tired that we didn’t even care to take another video or edit it.

images.name: 22_N
images.desc: This time a more real experience in Elections with making all sorts of deals to get more votes. Rutul stood for Synapse. He was busy with outstation just days before Elections. Others campaigned for him room-to-room.

images.name: 23_V
images.desc: Rutul became uncaring and rude like politicians after coming to power. This is one of the proof in his chat with Roshan (In reality we annoyed the shit out of him by asking this question so many times)

images.name: 24_H
images.desc: Just another day in Roshan’s life. Probability that you will find him sleeping during any given period of the day is greater than 0.7 according to research done by Nisarg in one of his CS subjects.

images.name: 25_N
images.desc:
So, after the 4th sem, only 2 months were left before the Internship Season kicked off. Almost every one stayed back on campus to sharpen their weapons before the final(well practically the psuedo-final) war began. The weather report was against us. Many warned us about the heat. But we decided to take on the challenge. Well it wasn't like we didn't have any options. Everyone was studying in the RC(Resource Centre with AC). But, for us, that was not an option as we like to talk, shout and make noise, and that wasn't allowed there. So, we moved our base camp to  the Project Lab(AC  enabled) where we were allowed to make atleast some noise. We stayed there whole day studying, watching movies, and matches. Aagam even brought his food dabbas, sat on the table and started eating, until the security guy saw that and stopped him.

Since we used to study all night, there were times when we went to play football early in the  morning (mostly Natukaka-Bagha style football - only penalties), had Ghathiya at Gh-2 and Pohe at TCS for breakfast and then went to sleep for the rest of the day.

Amazon was the first company to visit for internships. After the coding test, there were students who were expecting call for interviews based on their test performace and some who thought that that was it for them for Amazon. But when the list of selected students came out, many were surprised for not getting selected. There were also few students who were probably sleeping or eating or doing anything but expecting a call for interview, and they had to rush to the placement cell. They didn't even have their resume printed and had to send some friend for printing. Such was the chaos on the first day of our intership-drive.

images.name: 26_H
images.desc: Just a usual sight on any one of the beds in E-205 or E-208. Also don’t know why is Roshan dabbing while sleeping?

images.name: 27_N
images.desc: GOT Musical Night: One night when Shashank came back to room with his DTG instruments and someone stated playing those. Eventually everyone got something to play. Whoever didn’t get anything, they used tables and bucket

images.name: 28_H
images.desc: During Internship Summer when Nisarg practically shifted to E-205. We used cross-ventilation by keeping doors and windows open. When sleeping at night, our blankets and shawls were lying distant but by morning it was so chilling we found ourselves draped in that. This is a photo by someone who was passing by our open room.
